thread.title: Sunken oil ship leaves 10-mile slick in East China Sea

title: Sunken oil ship leaves 10-mile slick in East China Sea
text:
Sunken oil ship leaves 10-mile slick in East China Sea 11:58am GMT - 01:53 
Officials and local media say a burning Iranian oil tanker that sank in the East China Sea has produced a 10-mile long oil slick as black smoke continues to billow from the site, in the worst oil ship disaster in decades.   
Officials and local media say a burning Iranian oil tanker that sank in the East China Sea has produced a 10-mile long oil slick as black smoke continues to billow from the site, in the worst oil ship disaster in decades.  //reut.rs/2B1f6vG
